attributes.action: Help young people help with mental health quicker!
attributes.additional_details: Mental Health is becoming a huge factor within young people & they need the support instantly!
attributes.background:
Provide the support right from the start for young people when they are suffering with mental health issues.

It takes too long for them to get support, or they get told it's not the right time..

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620846
